intro: Ouratea goossensii, commonly known as the Goossens' ouratea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. It typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 5 meters. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens and as a houseplant.
